comments:
when create new Dyna web project with WTP-NLPack,
wtp.nls/**/plugins/*.jst.server.generic.serverdef*/*.properties 
"*runtimeTypeName" property that contains non-ascii char
causes following exception and block the wizard.

<snipped remain>

Workaround:
[a] run SDK with -nl en_US, or
[b] escape those properties in NLPack
I just released a change to add an xml header declaration to the project.facet.core.xml. This *may* resolve this issue. Try this again when RC2 is released. Re-open if this does not resolve it.
